ygData.subject: RE: Jackalstock
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm since those are ALL/ALL and bards can dual wield their fists when punching with a mandolin/lute, can the same be said for monks?  I have an 18th level
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm since those are ALL/ALL and bards can dual wield their fists when
punching with a mandolin/lute, can the same be said for monks? I have an
18th level monk and that would be so damn cool to punch with one of those in
my hand. Holding one in each hand would be even better. Sort of a
testament to my bard. :)

Kurik Nitesong, 32nd Bard, Veeshan
Kayra, 18th Monk, Veeshan

___________________
Robert Maze

robert@...
www.fncinc.com

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 3:11 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Jackalstock


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Yep, Mandolins are All/All! Go figure. My enchanter always carries one
as
a symbol. What else would I put in my hand anyhow I don't have a book or
nifty stein yet.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 11:58 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Jackalstock


From: Papa Legba <legba@...>

Halflings can hold mandolins?
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
